question: Which country has invited India to join in developing next-generation nuclear reactor and to participate in its multipurpose fast research reactor (MBIR) project?
explanation: Russia has invited India to join in developing next-generation nuclear reactors and to participate in its fast-reactor research project called the multipurpose fast research reactor project MBIR, which is coming up as the International Research Center in Dimitrovgrad located in the Ulyanovsk region.
